text:
The manual page for FileSets doesn't mention that Selectors can be used.  Some 
sort of reference to Selectors should be added.  For example, going by the 
FileSets man page, you couldn't trace what this does:

<fileset dir="${doc.path}" includes="**/*.html">
    <contains text="script" casesensitive="no"/>
</fileset>
creator: gjfdh@yahoo.com

text:
Good point. Documentation is changed in CVS for both the FileSets and the 
Directory-based Tasks, on both the main trunk and the 1.5 release branch.

Thanks.
